data.author: Queen Elizabeth II
data.quote: What were once only hopes for the future have now come to pass; it is almost exactly 13 years since the overwhelming majority of people in Ireland and Northern Ireland voted in favour of the agreement signed on Good Friday 1998, paving the way for Northern Ireland to become the exciting and inspirational place that it is today.

data.author: Ray Kroc
data.quote: The two most important requirements for major success are: first, being in the right place at the right time, and second, doing something about it.

data.author: Henry Kissinger
data.quote: No foreign policy - no matter how ingenious - has any chance of success if it is born in the minds of a few and carried in the hearts of none.

data.author: Howard Nemerov
data.quote: The secrets of success are a good wife and a steady job. My wife told me.

data.author: Scott Adams
data.quote: Every skill you acquire doubles your odds of success.

data.author: Alessia Cara
data.quote: Success is when you see something, and you say, 'I want to do that,' and then you do it. It's being happy with what you do and doing what you love every day.

data.author: Arlen Specter
data.quote: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.

data.author: Christine Teigen
data.quote: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.

data.author: e. e. cummings
data.quote: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.

data.author: Rush Limbaugh
data.quote: I want anyone who believes in life, liberty, pursuit of happiness to succeed. And I want any force, any person, any element of an overarching Big Government that would stop your success, I want that organization, that element or that person to fail. I want you to succeed.

data.author: Andrew Shue
data.quote: I have amazing friends who have led inspirational lives.

data.author: Isaac Newton
data.quote: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.

data.author: Philip Guedalla
data.quote: Success is little more than a chemical compound of man with moment.

data.author: Joseph Campbell
data.quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.

data.author: Thomas Wolfe
data.quote: You have reached the pinnacle of success as soon as you become uninterested in money, compliments, or publicity.

data.author: Arthur C. Clarke
data.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.

data.author: Swami Sivananda
data.quote: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.

data.author: Miguel de Cervantes
data.quote: To be prepared is half the victory.

data.author: Samuel Goldwyn
data.quote: Give me a couple of years, and I'll make that actress an overnight success.

data.author: Edward Thorndike
data.quote: It will, of course, be understood that directly or indirectly, soon or late, every advance in the sciences of human nature will contribute to our success in controlling human nature and changing it to the advantage of the common weal.
